channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump defends Hegseth over reports of a second strike on alleged drug boat

item.title: Trump does not plan to send troops into Venezuela, Sen. Markwayne Mullin says
item.description: Sen. Markwayne Mullin said Sunday that President Trump does not plan to attack Venezuela.

item.title: White House bullish on economic growth as Thanksgiving spending rises

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
